Name: ARE YOU READY VR
About the game: Are you Ready VR game is simple clay pigeon shooting. you can enjoy shooting in peacefull plain. you can get some score by shooting target. or you can competition and enjoy with your freind. * If you have 'HTC vive gun' , you can feel more realistic
